# Utils

utils는 노드와 통신을 하지 않습니다.

* [usage](#usage)
* [isAddress](#isAddress)
* [isTxHash](#isTxHash)
* [isBlockHash](#isBlockHash)
* [fromConvert](#fromConvert)
* [toConvert](#toConvert)
* [unitMap](#unitMap)

## usage

```python
from EITRI import utils
```

## isAddress

```python
EITRI.utils.isAddress(123)
```

## isTxHash

```python
EITRI.utils.isTxHash(123)
```

## isBlockHash

```python
EITRI.utils.isBlockHash(123)
```

## fromConvert

```python
EITRI.utils.fromConvert(123)
```

## toConvert

```python
EITRI.utils.toConvert(123)
```

## unitMap

```python
EITRI.utils.unitMap()
```
